stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, purge virus counters. Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, trash 1 virus. Subroutine Trace[2]. If successful, remove a virus in the heap from the game. Subroutine Trace[1]. If successful, end the run.
text: [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, purge virus counters. [subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, trash 1 virus. [subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, remove a virus in the heap from the game. [subroutine] Trace[1]. If successful, end the run.
title: Macrophage
